item.title: Reet add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: Reet add a quote by Bertrand Russell
item.description: "From that awful encounter of the soul with the outer world, enunciation, wisdom, and charity are born; and with their birth a new life begins. To take into the inmost shrine of the soul the irresistible forces whose puppets we seem to be - Death and change, the irrevocableness of the past, and the powerlessness of Man before the blind hurry of the universe from vanity to vanity - to feel these things and know them is to conquer them." -- Bertrand Russell

item.title: Reet add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch
